author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: أَمْرَكَ وَاخْذُلْ أَعْدائَكَ، ثُمَّ اكْتُبْ لَنا خَيْرَ الآخِرَةِ وَالأُولى وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الحَقُّ عَلاَّمُ الغُيُوبِ لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ الغَفُورُ الْكَرِيمُ.
translation: Render Thy Cause victorious, O my Lord, and abase Thou Thine enemies. Write down, then, for us the good of this life and of the life to come. Thou art the Truth, Who knoweth the secret things. No God is there but Thee, the Ever-Forgiving, the All-Bountiful.
